document.full_text: there is no strong evidence that any dietary or lifestyle changes can reduce a person's risk of developing alzheimer's disease, a u.s. government panel said on monday.
document.title: lifestyle, diet have little effect on alzhiemer's
lines_and_colors: there is no strong evidence that any dietary or lifestyle changes can reduce a person's risk of developing alzheimer's disease, a u.s. government panel said on monday.
